summary: Guy Fawkes Day, 1892. Oscar Wilde goes to a performance of his controversial, banned play 'Salome'. The 'theatre's a brothel and the performers... prostitutes.
cast: Glenda Jackson|Stratford Johns|Nickolas Grace|Douglas Hodge|Imogen Millais-Scott|Denis Lill|Russell Lee Nash|Ken Russell|David Doyle|Warren Saire|Kenny Ireland|Michael Van Wijk|Paul Clayton|Imogen Claire|Tim Potter|Matthew Taylor|Linzi Drew|Tina Shaw|Caron Anne Kelly|Mike Edmonds|Willie Coppen|Anthony Georghiou|Leon Herbert|Dougie Howes|Lionel Taylor|Colin Hunt|David Addison|Robert Goodey|Danny Godfrey|Allison Cella|Frank Cella|Simon Gilbey|James Harte|Martino Lazzeri|Sinead Lightly|Sheree Murphy|Charles Richards
keywords: year 1892|hansom cab|green carnation boutaniere|book of sketches|gold body paint
title: Salomé, el precio de la pasión
